A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think the negative reviews from this movie stem from people wanting to see specific things and not getting them. If you go into it with an agenda you’ll be disappointed\, but if you’re just a Star Wars fan wanting to see where it all goes\, you’ll have your breath taken away more than once. It’s not formulaic\, or expected\, and while it is no where near perfect\, the good parts of this movie (most of it)\, are some of the best\, most rewarding parts of the whole saga. Don’t get too caught up on what you think will happen\, because you’re wrong. Just enjoy the ride
